languages.text: {n}Из вокс-передатчика, покоящегося под вашей броней, неожиданно вырывается какофония звуков: рев пиломечей, человеческие крики, визг металла и стрекочущие помехи активной вокс-передачи. Манипуляции с клавишами, коммутатором и тумблерами лишь усугубляют буйство устройства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Из вокс-передатчика, покоящегося под вашей броней, неожиданно вырывается какофония звуков: рев пиломечей, человеческие крики, визг металла и стрекочущие помехи активной вокс-передачи. Манипуляции с клавишами, коммутатором и тумблерами лишь усугубляют буство устройства.{/n}

languages.text: {n}The vox-caster under your armour suddenly spits out a cacophony of sounds: the growl of chainswords, human screams, the screech of metal, and the rattling interference of an active vox-cast. Working the buttons, switches, and tumblers only makes it worse.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Из вокс-передатчика, покоящегося под вашей броней, неожиданно вырывается какофония звуков: рев пиломечей, человеческие крики, визг металла и стрекочущие помехи активной вокс-передачи. Манипуляции с клавишами, коммутатором и тумблерами лишь усугубляют буйство устройства.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}The vox-caster resting under your armour suddenly spits out a cacophony of sounds: the growl of chainswords, the human screams, the screech of metal, and the rattling interference of the active vox-cast. Fiddling with the buttons, switches and tumblers only makes it worse.{/n}

{n}The vox-caster resting under your armour suddenly spits out a cacophony of sounds: the growl of chainswords, the human screams, the screech of metal, and the rattling interference of the active vox-cast. Fiddling with the buttons, switches and tumblers only makes it worse.{/n}

{n}The vox-caster resting under your armour suddenly spits out a cacophony of sounds: the growl of chainswords, the human screams, the screech of metal, and the rattling interference of the active vox-cast. Fiddling with the buttons, switches and tumblers only makes it worse.{/n}

{n}The vox-caster resting under your armour suddenly spits out a cacophony of sounds: the growl of chainswords, the human screams, the screech of metal, and the rattling interference of the active vox-cast. Fiddling with the buttons, switches and tumblers only makes it worse.{/n}

{n}The vox-caster under your armour suddenly spits out a cacophony of sounds: the growl of chainswords, human screams, the screech of metal, and the rattling interference of an active vox-cast. Working the buttons, switches, and tumblers only makes it worse.{/n}

{n}The vox-caster under your armour suddenly spits out a cacophony of sounds: the growl of chainswords, human screams, the screech of metal, and the rattling interference of an active vox-cast. Working the buttons, switches, and tumblers only makes it worse.{/n}

languages.text: {n}De repente, el vocoamplificador que descansa bajo tu armadura escupe una cacofonía de sonidos: rugidos de espadas sierra, alaridos humanos, chirridos metálicos y las chasqueantes interferencias de la transmisión por voco. Oprimes algunos botones y giras los diales, pero solo consigues empeorarlo.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-caster under your armour suddenly spits out a cacophony of sounds: the growl of chainswords, human screams, the screech of metal, and the rattling interference of an active vox-cast. Working the buttons, switches, and tumblers only makes it worse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}De repente, el vocoamplificador que descansa bajo tu armadura escupe una cacofonía de sonidos: rugidos de espadas sierra, alaridos humanos, chirridos metálicos y las chasqueantes interferencias de la transmisión por voco. Oprimes algunos botones y giras los diales, pero solo consigues empeorarlo.{/n}

languages.text: {n}原本在你盔甲下安安静静的通讯器，此刻突然发出刺耳的声音，传来了链锯剑的咆哮声、人类的尖叫声，金属的尖鸣声，以及通讯器发出的杂音。这些声音掺杂在一起，震耳欲聋。无论是摆弄按钮、开关还是挡板，都只会让声音变得更加刺耳。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-caster under your armour suddenly spits out a cacophony of sounds: the growl of chainswords, human screams, the screech of metal, and the rattling interference of an active vox-cast. Working the buttons, switches, and tumblers only makes it worse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}原本在你盔甲下安安静静的通讯器，此刻突然发出刺耳的声音，传来了链锯剑的咆哮声、人类的尖叫声，金属的尖鸣声，以及通讯器发出的杂音。这些声音掺杂在一起，震耳欲聋。无论是摆弄按钮、开关还是挡板，都只会让声音变得更加刺耳。{/n}

languages.text: {n}L'émetteur vox sous votre armure se met soudain à crachoter une cacophonie de sons divers : des grondements de tronçonneuses, des hurlements humains et des crissements métalliques, auxquels s'ajoutent les interférences d'une transmission-vox. Vous appuyez sur les boutons pour tenter d'améliorer la réception, mais cela ne fait qu'empirer les choses.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-caster under your armour suddenly spits out a cacophony of sounds: the growl of chainswords, human screams, the screech of metal, and the rattling interference of an active vox-cast. Working the buttons, switches, and tumblers only makes it worse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}L'émetteur-vox sous votre armure se met soudain à crachoter une cacophonie de sons divers : des grondements de tronçonneuses, des hurlements humains et des crissements métalliques, auxquels s'ajoutent les interférences de la transmission-vox. Vous appuyez sur les boutons pour tenter d'améliorer la réception, mais cela ne fait qu'empirer les choses.{/n}

languages.text: {n}あなたのアーマーの下にある音声通信送受信装置が突如、不協和音を響かせる。チェーンソードのうなり声、人間の悲鳴、金属の悲鳴、そしてアクティブなヴォクスキャストのカタカタという妨害音。ボタンやスイッチ、タンブラーをいじっても、さらに悪化するだけだ。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-caster under your armour suddenly spits out a cacophony of sounds: the growl of chainswords, human screams, the screech of metal, and the rattling interference of an active vox-cast. Working the buttons, switches, and tumblers only makes it worse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}あなたのアーマーの下にある音声通信送受信装置が突如、不協和音を響かせる。チェーンソードのうなり声、人間の悲鳴、金属の悲鳴、そしてアクティブなヴォクスキャストのカタカタという妨害音。ボタンやスイッチ、タンブラーをいじっても、さらに悪化するだけだ。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Der Vox-Transmitter unter deiner Rüstung spuckt plötzlich eine Kakophonie von Geräuschen aus: das Knurren von Kettenschwertern, die menschlichen Schreie, das Kreischen von Metall und die rasselnden Interferenzen der aktiven Vox-Übertragung. An den Knöpfen und Schaltern herumzudrücken, macht alles nur noch schlimmer.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-caster under your armour suddenly spits out a cacophony of sounds: the growl of chainswords, human screams, the screech of metal, and the rattling interference of an active vox-cast. Working the buttons, switches, and tumblers only makes it worse.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Vox-Transmitter, der unter deiner Rüstung ruht, spuckt plötzlich eine Kakophonie von Geräuschen aus: das Knurren von Kettenschwertern, die menschlichen Schreie, das Kreischen von Metall und die rasselnden Interferenzen der aktiven Vox-Übertragung. An den Knöpfen und Schaltern herumzudrücken, macht alles nur noch schlimmer.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Zırhının altındaki voksyayar, aniden düzensiz sesler yaymaya başlıyor. Motorlu kılıçların homurtusunu, insanların çığlıklarını, metalin tiz cızırtısını ve aktif bir voks yayınının zangırdayan parazit sesini duyuyorsun. Düğmelerle, anahtarlarla ve mandallarla oynamak; sesi daha da kötü bir hâle getiriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}The vox-caster under your armour suddenly spits out a cacophony of sounds: the growl of chainswords, human screams, the screech of metal, and the rattling interference of an active vox-cast. Working the buttons, switches, and tumblers only makes it worse.{/n}
